alert.note: Alert for Alger; Luce; Marquette; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 15 at 4:48PM EST until December 16 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Marquette, Alger, Luce, Southern Schoolcraft and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 11 PM EST this evening. For the High Wind Warning, from 10 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions into this evening due to low visibility in dense fog. Damaging winds late tonight will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches late tonight and Thursday. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive. If driving this evening, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Alger; Luce; Marquette; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft
